thread.title: Parents draw eyebrows on their babies in viral photos | Daily Mail Online
thread.title_full: Parents draw eyebrows on their babies in viral photos | Daily Mail Online

author: Bianca London For Mailonline
title: Parents draw eyebrows on their babies in viral photos | Daily Mail Online
text: comments Little ones are giving bushy browed model Cara Delevingne a run for her money in a hilarious set of images sweeping the internet. Playful parents have etched eyebrows on their babies using pens - and the results will make you laugh out loud. The tots - many of whom are pulling animated expressions - have been adorned with bushy black brows, heavily arched features and some even have matching moustaches. Parents are drawing eyebrows on their babies and posting the hilarious results on the internet One parent stuck false eyelashes onto their baby's brows in a hilarious shot going viral The animated little babies clearly have no idea that their parents are mocking them in the laugh out loud posts One pouting little boy was given some extremely bushy brows using black felt material One happy chap donned a Hawaiian shirt, thick brows and moustache for his snap The cute children were treated to eyebrows to rival supermodel Cara Delevingne, who put bushy brows firmly on the fashion map Two female twins looked delighted with their new look as they beamed for the camera One parent went as far as to turn his baby into the star of a comedy photoshoot complete with dinosaur props A curious tot was given rather realistic black brows, as well as a jaunty little top hat Some of the children looked rather terrifying with their severe new brows The hilarious photos are doing the rounds on the internet Many of the mothers and fathers have dressed their children up with props such as glitzy dickie bows The pictures are sweeping social media under the hashtag #babieswitheyebrows The children's expressions range from bemused, left, to baffled, right One little one looked completely perplexed as she posed for a photo with her bold new look Some parents were so impressed with their baby's new look that they created a full collage using the snaps People have been sharing the snaps only saying there's 'finally a reason to have children' One baby was crying with laughter at his new look, left, whilst another was blissfully unaware of his new face, right Parents have etched bold brows onto their babies using marker pens The tots - many of whom are pulling animated expressions - have been adorned with bushy black brows, heavily arched brows and some even have matching moustaches This little lady didn't look too impressed with her daring new look One tot appeared to have caught his reflection in the mirror, left, whilst another seemed totally confused, right Share or comment on this article Most watched News videos
